summary: LinkedIn is a popular online platform for jobs and business, with over 1 billion users worldwide. It was started in 2003 by Reid Hoffman and Eric Ly. Microsoft now owns it. People use LinkedIn to connect with colleagues, find jobs, and network professionally. Users can create profiles, share their resumes, and look for work. The site also offers tools to organize events, join groups, and publish articles. It's a great way to build and maintain professional relationships.
title: LinkedIn
